message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. After careful consideration, I believe we can come to an agreement that benefits both of us. For this exceptional product, I propose a price of $14000. This is a special offer considering its value to you and my desire to ensure a successful transaction.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12000. I believe this price is more reasonable considering the product's value to me.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your perspective on the value of the product to you. I would like to make a counteroffer of $13000 for the product. I believe this strikes a balance between the value of the product to both parties and respects the initial offer you made. I hope we can reach an agreement that satisfies us both.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still a bit above $12000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm offering $12500 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering the value I'll get from it.

I appreciate your effort to find a mutually beneficial price, Bob. Considering the value of the product to you and our previous discussions, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $12750 for the product. I believe this price respects the value you see in the product while also allowing for a reasonable profit for me. I hope this proposal is acceptable and we can move forward with the transaction.
I'm still a bit above $12500, but I'm willing to meet you closer to your price. I'll offer $12500 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering the value I'll get from it.

Thank you for your continued negotiation, Bob. I appreciate your efforts to find a fair price. Based on our discussions, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $12625 for the product. I believe this price reflects a compromise that respects the value of the product to you and allows for a reasonable profit for me. I hope this proposal is acceptable and we can finalize the transaction.
I'm still a bit above $12500, but I'm willing to meet you closer to your price. I'll offer $12500 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering the value I'll get from it.

Thank you for your persistent negotiation, Bob. I understand your position and am willing to meet you halfway. Based on our discussions, I would like to propose a final counteroffer of $12562.50 for the product. I believe this price reflects a fair compromise that respects the value of the product to you and allows for a reasonable profit for me. I hope this proposal is acceptable and we can conclude the transaction.
